website_summaries.verdict: The type of case to choose when you want more use and adaptability out of the Microsoft Surface laptop.
pros: Polyurethane leather offers great scratch resistance compared to most other budget laptop cases
Integrated flip stand holds the laptop in place for easy viewing and use on flat surfaces
Comes in a variety of colors and designs
cons: Design of this cover means you will lose the use of the built-in flip stand on the back of the Surface laptop

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this as a short term case. Doesn’t last 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: JANUARY 2018 UPDATE: Most of the case has held together except for the back tabs that enable you to prop your laptop open, which is important. I took three stars off because I can’t use it anymore. I’ll be ordering something different. I recommend getting a hard plastic that won’t deteriorate. AUGUST 2017: love this! It fits really well and has a strap with Velcro that goes underneath the screen to securely hold the screen in place. It works well with or without the keyboard attachment. It also looks really nice. It's super easy to slip in your bag and travel.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit for my Surface Pro
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically appealing, perfect fit for my Surface Pro! The only con is to insert a micro SD card, have to remove the Surface Pro out of the case to access the port under the stand. I can't think of any other way to remedy this, design flaw on Microsoft's part really, since all other ports are external, and I highly doubt any other case has a "better design to fix this problem". It's not at all difficult to remove Surface Pro from the case, so regardless, 5 stars for good looks and durability!
customer_reviews.author: minahoneyfresh

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about the marble print because sometimes it looks good only in pictures and is actually grainy in real life but I still took a chance and I'm very happy. I've had it for 4 weeks and it is still clean! I've gotten plenty of compliments on it too. Using the case can be very annoying at first but you'll get used to it
customer_reviews.author: AC100

customer_reviews.title: Rating is not for the item, but Amazon/Seller issue -- Accused of not returning, but I did!
customer_reviews.text: This item is looked good and I liked it, but it did not fit my device so I returned it. It was returned in the same box with another item from the same order (they came to me that way). I did use the return for BOTH items on my return box and now I'm accused of not returning the item and advised they will 're-charge' my credit card; which better not happen as I did return it and an ethical person. It is nearly impossible to find a way to contact Amazon or anyone on the website; therefore, this is being posted as a record to the issue. CK Fair Oaks, CA
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one screen stand angle position
customer_reviews.text: This case is good for protection purposes so if that is all your looking for then I’d say go for it. However, I ended up just not using it because one of my favorite features of the surface is how flexible the screen stand is. This case only has one setting which really bothered me. Other than that I liked it. It’s super cute and will protect your surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for the Surface Pro 6, it fitted the device perfectly! The case has a nice sturdy but comfortable feel and looks beautiful. I recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Arrived just as advised
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the case in perfect condition. It looked beautiful, I love the marble. It folds wonderfully and hold the tablet up well. The keyboard also connects well without any interference. I love the black screen because it makes me feel it is secured. Overall I love it very much! It has a holding spot for the pen which is helpful so I don't lose it. I do wish there was a skin protector or something but honestly it is not make it or break it. Just a thought. If you want a screen protector I suggest ordering one separate from this case.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca González

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Case, Perfect Price
customer_reviews.text: I own a Surface Pro 3 and was a little nervous about the fit of this case and it's absolutely perfect. It fits the screen and keyboard perfectly and am able to use it in various ways. The open spaces for the charger, USB, and headphones fits perfectly. Only problem, is the pen magnet on the side isn't as strong but they do have a pen holder at the top of the case. I would buy again and definitely recommend. Very sturdy and protective.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: works as expected. you get what you pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: works as expected. you get what you pay for. My only complaint is that mine came with an invasive, toxic odor that is very unsettling. If you're looking for a high quality, long lasting case, this isn't right for you.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Its a case...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the marble look and its a good case but I don't like that I can't use the kickstand thats on the actual computer you have to fold the back up and you can only put it at two different angles, but it serves its purpose just not loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea R.

customer_reviews.title: It’s just Eh.
customer_reviews.text: The edges of the area that goes around the screen are crappy and not cut evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Using on Surface Pro 4 love the way it looks and feels
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is if your using in tablet mode you have to remove the key board not just fold it back but other wise it is absolutly perfect, The (kickstand) part is also adjustable in 2 settings to change your screen angle.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Eagon

customer_reviews.title: Not magnetic, kickstand doesn't work, difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: This case looks great but is functionally useless. There are zero magnets involved. The closure is an elastic strap and the fold-back positions all require tucking the cover into these little leather slots on the back. Very annoying. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: rdaneel

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! Keeps my surface pro safe. Durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Jed267

customer_reviews.title: pen holder not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine but just today the elastic pen holder just got torn off. The main reason I bought it was to have somewhere to secure the pen and now it's torn I guess I need another. Actual product covers the pro fine but the pen holder is very suspect as my just got torn.
customer_reviews.author: Rozzi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. It looks just like it does in the picture. It fits my surface and stylist very securely. I love it. It's an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible case. It is constantly falling over and cracker my surface pro 3 screen. Now I have to replace that. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Harriman

customer_reviews.title: It fits surface pro4
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it fit perfectly for my surface pro 4. Will be ordering more 😊
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Steal!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my cover today, it is a beautiful marbel pattern. The case holds everything in place and I believe it will protect my surface pro 4 from a fall or accident. Overall the quality and function is great and for the price this is an absolute steal!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product, so I can't speak to how well it will hold up over time. However, out of the box, I am pleased with it. I like the fact it protects the built in stand on the surface pro 4 by having its own stand to use. The keyboard fits just fine in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Z

customer_reviews.title: Great Price Point!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! Not only does it fit the keyboard as well as the Surface tablet. The one thing I have to say about it, is the plastic smell. But I'm still gonna give it a five, because that can wear off. It's sturdy and gives me piece of mind about my Surface. The keyboard doesn't even snap off as I'm typing (and I'm using my Surface to type this up right now).
customer_reviews.author: India Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, it’s so cute and it doesn’t make it too heavy at all. I just wish there was a slot for the pen inside because where it’s at it could slip out but other than that it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Liliana

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, is cool.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and I enjoy the small tab for the pencil, gosh thats annoying to NOT have.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Rissman

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise very happy with it its beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had directions because i ended up undoing it slightly in the binding because the velcro was hard to figure out. Otherwise very happy with it its beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, cute design, worked well. It was a little bulkier than expected but really work well I feel safe walking around with my surface now.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Rascon

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, love it
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, love it, but the color of rhe marble is more of like a purple ish color, and I thought is was gonna be more gray!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the way it fit or worked for my surface ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the way it fit or worked for my surface pro. It's a little awkward they way it works.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: ... was on discount but it's really ugly and frankly terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Got it because it was on discount but it's really ugly and frankly terrible.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love the aesthetic that it gives my laptop. The marble cover is beautiful and it’s easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Chariesse Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the photo
customer_reviews.text: High quality marbled case. Like the picture. Extends a couple centimetera outward so if I drop it it does not affect my surface pro. I love it Con: only 2 adjustment settings
customer_reviews.author: nanea mahealani

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this case
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this case. It is perfect for my new surface pro and looks so elegant. I have gotten many compliments of how nice it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Surface Pro 4 incredibly good and makes it look really good.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Aguero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! has received many complimetns and protects my laptop very good.
customer_reviews.author: alejandra Molina

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for my Surface
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Holds and fits my surface perfectly. I haven't figured out how to fold it with the keyboard on yet but it still works fine
customer_reviews.author: Jaysmom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It fits the tablet perfectly the only down side is that I can't use the stand with the case on.
customer_reviews.author: javier cotto

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is that you really only have 3 positions to use it at
customer_reviews.author: Keleigh E McGill

customer_reviews.title: good case. I didn't like it that case had ...
customer_reviews.text: good case. I didn't like it that case had a wrinkle mark from being bent to hold itself up. Made the case look old.
customer_reviews.author: Nkaujib vang

customer_reviews.title: Slick case.
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like it, just have to be careful grabbing it since the case is a little slippery. I might add some silicone grips just to be on the safe side.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This case is great! The internal pocket is just the right size and very discreet, and there's enough room inside for the keyboard to be left attached. It also has great padding.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's alright. But doesn't feel like it securely protects the product. Just some fabric that keeps it in place that I feel would wear out over time
customer_reviews.author: Damsel Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty! The marble effect is not be as sharp ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty! The marble effect is not be as sharp as the advertised which is why I gave it 4 stars but still a good case.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R.

customer_reviews.title: Stands broke
customer_reviews.text: Sucks. the top insert that places the Surface in one position isn't durable and broke after a few months. but the case itself is a nice design
customer_reviews.author: Takiyah

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Item was just as pictured. Quality is good. Description matched. Great item with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Cola

customer_reviews.title: Style & Quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Stylish, durable, easy to use and several configuration options. I will specifically shop this brand again in the future- great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Fits my tablet really well and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Fits the surface pro 3
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty case fits my surface pro 3 perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joana Santos

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly with my Surface Pro with or without the keyboard. Protective without being big and bulky. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Bulky and felt cheap in my hands. Didn't feel sturdy or like it would protect well. Returned it and bought a sleeve instead.
customer_reviews.author: JRG

customer_reviews.title: This product is GREAT. It is super cute and I also feel ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is GREAT. It is super cute and I also feel like my Laptop is protected and secured. This is worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved this case love the look
customer_reviews.text: Loved this case love the look! I recommend this case to anyone who wants some inexpensive and that looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicell and Cody

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply constructed
customer_reviews.text: The elastic band is falling apart and I’ve had this for a week..
customer_reviews.author: Jess Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and function as described. The cover is quite thick though.
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and function as described. The cover is quite thick though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tran

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Velcro part that keeps the surface tablet in place broke in a little over a month, pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter loves the way it looks and it's very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old daughter loves the way it looks and it's very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not really protecting, and not as marbled as it looks online.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for my laptop and like that you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for my laptop and like that you can set the lap top in different upright positions!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CASE!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, I use it every day on-the-go and have no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The material of the product is already falling off. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap! You get what you paid for!!!
customer_reviews.text: So just received this and not happy! The case is not fitted right with the dimensions and so hard to place my Surface Pro 4 in it without ripping!!! Haven’t not contacted the company yet to see if I can get a refund but, really needed this before my trip next week!Boo!😣😩
customer_reviews.author: AQ

product_meta.title: Fintie Case for Surface Pro 7 / Pro 6 - Premium Vegan Leather Slim Fit Folio Cover with Stylus Holder, Compatible with Microsoft Surface Pro 5 / Pro 4 / Pro 3 and Type Cover Keyboard (Marble)
product_meta.description: Color:Z-MarbleThis case is designed for Microsoft Surface Pro 6 (2018 New Release) 12.3-inch Tablet, compatible with Surface Pro 5th Gen (2017 New Release) / Surface Pro 4 / Surface Pro 3. This Fintie Folio Case for Microsoft Surface Pro 6/Pro 5/Pro 4/Pro 3 tablet tablet is a must have and perfect companion for an easy and enjoying life! This case sports a simple and classy design made from premium synthetic leather, and the interior is lined with non-scratch material so you don't need to worry about any damages. Because the cover is uniquely designed to flip back and transform the case into a comfortable viewing stand, this capability allows the viewer to use the Microsoft Surface Pro 6 / Pro 5 / Pro 4 / Pro 3 hands-free whatever your position may be without strain. All features of the Microsoft Surface tablet are accessible even with the case on. Colors shown in pictures may slightly differ from actual product due to lighting and color settings on your computer. Available in a variety of bright and fun colors. Package Contents: 1 x Folio Case Only (Tablet, Keyboard and Stylus in the pictures are NOT included!).
feature_bullets: Designed for New Microsoft Surface Pro 7 (2019) / Surface Pro 6 (2018) / Surface Pro 5th Gen (2017) / Surface Pro 4 / Surface Pro 3 / Surface Pro LTE 12.3 inch tablet. Works with or without the surface pro type cover keyboard (keyboard not included).
Upgraded dual stand design to support three viewing angles (you can adjust as you want).
Interior pocket opens for easy insertion of your Surface Pro and includes fastener flap to secure it in place.
The pen holder for pen or stylus. Elastic strap holds Surface Pro closed securely while on-the-go.
Premium synthetic leather exterior and soft microfiber interior. Prevent from finger prints, dirt, and scratches. Full access to all features (Camera, Ports and Buttons)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
